Public Safety > News Font Size
Person shot in Fort Carson robbery
October 11, 2010 9:01 PM | Print Story | E-Mail Story CARLYN RAY MITCHELL THE GAZETTE One person was shot Monday night in an armed robbery at the Burger King on Fort Carson.
The robbery took place around 8:15 p.m. Fort Carson police questioned and released one person, said Fort Carson spokesman Devin Fischer.
The person shot was taken to the hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
Gates surrounding the post were temporarily closed as a precaution, Fischer said.
No arrests had been made late Monday and no other details were released.
See archived 'Public Safety' stories»
